section.p: 'Look!' screams one, pointing at you. 'A foreign swine!'
'I bet he isn't a true worshipper of Ebron,' yells another.
'Let's stone the blaspheming heretic,' shouts someone else.
'No, wait,' says their leader. 'We should at least give this foreigner a chance.'
They demand you recite a blessing of Ebron to prove you are a member of the church. Desperately you rack your brains, trying to remember what you have picked up during your time in Uttaku.
. Add one if you are a member of the Church of Ebron.
